response.original_title: ซิงโครไนซ์
response.overview: In the near future, Bangkok metropolitan area is split between a futuristic Utopia and a crumbling dystopia. Nana is a hunter with a mission to track down those with special powers and those who are corrupted by the power. She is promised for a chance to find her missing parents if she succeeds. But when she discovers a shocking truth behind her mission, she joins a rebel group to stop the ruler of the Utopia from opening a gateway that could bring immense destruction. Nana must unlock her own hidden power to prevent the world from being overrun by otherworldly threats.
response.title: Synchronize

crew.name: Kongkiat Khomsiri
crew.original_name: ก้องเกียรติ โขมศิริ
